about_the_game:
Our reality is over there as well.

This is the story of our faves in the other world and us in this world.

Our cheering becomes light, transcends the walls of the real world, and eventually resonates through to the world over there, where our faves are.

Our faves are indeed there.

The sight, voice, and even the breathing of our faves will lead us on an adventure beyond our imagination.

Yes, our reality is over there as well.

Experience various contents such as live music performances and music videos by virtual characters such as Vtubers and Vsingers in VR. Switch the camera to enjoy various angles and screenshot your favorite moments. Dive into the world of your faves and enjoy the realistic experience.

Our reality is over there as well.

This is the story of our faves in the other world and us in this world.

Our cheering becomes light, transcends the walls of the real world, and eventually resonates through to the world over there, where our faves are.

Our faves are indeed there.

The sight, voice, and even the breathing of our faves will lead us on an adventure beyond our imagination.

Yes, our reality is over there as well.

Experience various contents such as live music performances and music videos by virtual characters such as Vtubers and Vsingers in VR. Switch the camera to enjoy various angles and screenshot your favorite moments. Dive into the world of your faves and enjoy the realistic experience.
name: Atchmo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR:Meta Quest 2 , Meta Quest 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700XT / NVIDIA GeForce RTX2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR:Meta Quest 2 , Meta Quest 3

short_description: Experience various contents such as live music performances and music videos by virtual characters such as Vtubers and Vsingers in VR. Switch the camera to enjoy various angles and screenshot your favorite moments. Dive into the world of your faves and enjoy the realistic experience.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
